item.title: Buns
item.description: Ingredients (per 4 buns) 220g all-purpose flour 20g sugar 14g butter, room temperature (1 tbsp.) 1 egg 5g salt 4g yeast sesame or poppy seeds Procedure Knead dough until smooth: 200g flour, 4g salt, 20g sugar, 14g butter, 1 egg yolk, 100+g water Rise until nearly doubled (~2 hours). Divide and proof (~1 hour). Brush with egg wash: 1 egg white, 50g water Sprinkle on seeds.

Taqueria La Familia 2/5 lettuce in burrito bad stale chips and tortilla uninspiring flavors Shekhwhat 3/5 chewy meat nice vegetables flavoring and solid injera Glin Thai Canteen 2/5 pad thai overly sweet mild otherwise unimpressive Nick’s Pizza Cheeseboard crust with conventional pizza 5/5

Roma very good The Man from U.N.C.L.E unwatchable absurd, trope-ridden, cheesy, cringe. The Conversation good stunning cinematography, but a little pretentious for my tastes. Audio issues. Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy good, a bit slow

The Simple d12 System Philosophy Simple d12 is a minimalist, setting-agnostic, abstractly realistic system. It is designed for ease of character generation and minimal player downtime. Combat is authentically fast-paced, high pressure, and lethal. Character Generation Determine a setting-appropriate background, consisting of a character’s: upbringing, including: nationality culture social class education (formal or informal, if any) previous experience (if any) e.g. military service Select a vocation, specialized as appropriate to the setting.
